Name: Right of Final Interpretation
Title: Yanfei: Right of Final Interpretation
Desc: "When it comes to cards... Well, anything is permissible, so long as the rules don't forbid it."
Source: Reward for inviting Yanfei to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Right of Final Interpretation
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1308]</color> is your active character, equip this card.
After $[A1308] equips this card, she will immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S13081]</color> once.
When $[A1308] uses a $[K51] with this card equipped: Deal +1 DMG to enemies with 6 or less HP If $[K1010] is triggered, then draw 1 card after the skill finishes calculating.
(You must have $[A1308] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

K51.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>
K51.Desc: Before your Action Phase, should the total number of your Elemental Dice be even, your Normal Attack will be considered a Charged Attack.

K1010.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Scarlet Seal</color>
K1010.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character uses a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>:</color> DMG dealt +2.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 1</color> (Can stack. Max 2 stacks.)
